item.title: By: TechCrunch
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch
item.content:encoded:
Profile – IceRocket

Company: IceRocket (Soon to be renamed BlogScour)

Location: Dallas, Texas
What is it?
IceRocket is a blog search engine, and a damn good one, owned by Mark Cuban. In our opinion they aren’t quite ready to take on the king of blog search yet…

item.title: By: Blake
item.dc:creator: Blake
item.description:
Thanks for the link. I hope you like our blog search : http://blogs.icerocket.com/ , email us if you have suggestions.
B
